DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not the unaltered portion of the product was infused.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Negation Alteration Portion Product Infusion Procedure Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction._A change resulting in something that is different from the original._One of the portions into which something is regarded as divided and which together constitute a whole._The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced._A method of putting fluids, including drugs, into the bloodstream._Executed and carried through to completion.

Concepts.definition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
The act or process of modifying something.
One of the portions into which something is regarded as divided and which together constitute a whole.
The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.
Any form of treatment that is introduced into the body via a blood vessel, a muscle, or the spinal cord.
Executed and carried through to completion.
